bibl.title: The Stagni Painted Tomb: Cultural Interchange and Gender Differentiation in Roman Alexandria. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Interprets the architectural and pictorial program of the Stagni Tomb (excavated in Alexandria in 1989) as indicative of classical and Egyptian cultural interchange and gender-specific decoration in Roman-period Alexandrian funerary art.
bibl.seg: VENIT Marjorie Susan, The Stagni Painted Tomb: Cultural Interchange and Gender Differentiation in Roman Alexandria. Avec résumé en anglais.

Interprets the architectural and pictorial program of the Stagni Tomb (excavated in Alexandria in 1989) as indicative of classical and Egyptian cultural interchange and gender-specific decoration in Roman-period Alexandrian funerary art.
